definition: leave of absence request (from work or school)/excuse note/CL:張|张[zhang1]
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)
sick note/medical certificate for sick leave
leave of absence request (from work or school)

sentences.english: I have to go out for three days. I will appreciate if you grant my leave.
sentences.chinese: 如果你批准了我的假條我將會十分感激你的。

sentences.english: Arising tone can not be used here.
sentences.chinese: 相比看北京病假條這兒不能用升調。

sentences.english: She said she'd make a copy for her teacher.
sentences.chinese: 她說自己要複印一張假條交給老師。

sentences.english: Secondly, cannot absent, if ill write school.
sentences.chinese: 其次，不能缺席，若生病寫請假條。

sentences.english: To support my application, I submit here a telegram from my brother.
sentences.chinese: 隨請假條附上我弟弟拍來的電報，以此證明。

sentences.english: He handed in an excuse to the teacher.
Bye. Don't forget about that note.
Better turn in your vacation notice right now.
Do you need me to write a note?
Employers were welcome to bring suspect paperwork to the hospital for investigation, the official added.
sentences.chinese: 他還表示歡迎僱主們來醫院對可疑的假條做鑑定。

sentences.english: The actual time of sick leave of the employee must be verified by the signature of the direct supervisor on the leave permit.
sentences.chinese: 員工實際休病假時間需由直接領導在假條上簽字認定。

sentences.english: his anxious mother would ask, and I would print it out and sign it.
sentences.chinese: 他焦慮的母親會問道，我便給他們打印病假條並簽字。

sentences.english: Students must bring a note for a parent explaining any absence or tardiness.
sentences.chinese: 任何缺勤或遲到，需要出示家長寫的請假條。

sentences.english: Do you know anyone who can forge a sick note for me?
sentences.chinese: 你知道誰可以幫我虛開一張病假條？

sentences.english: Here's a sick note for three days.
sentences.chinese: 這是一張三天的病假條。

sentences.english: I wrote my own sick note excusing myself from music lessons.
sentences.chinese: 我寫了病假條，希望可以得到允許不去上音樂課。

definition: to put sb on an intravenous drip
to form a scar/to form a scab
genre of song-and-dance duet popular in northeast China
to mention/to bring up (a subject)/with regard to/as for
to hold back from saying precisely what is on one's mind
